Thus , HPV vaccination could complement exist pre-adolescent/adolescent vaccination program . This Phase IIIb study design evaluate immunogenicity safety co-administering commercially available vaccine GSK Biologicals ' HPV-16/18 L1 VLP AS04 ( Cervarix TM ) vaccine compare administration either vaccine alone .
